# AccelerateMutableBuffer

**Protocol**

A type that represents a mutable buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AccelerateMutableBuffer<Element> : AccelerateBuffer
```

## Overview

If you implement your own type that conforms to [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/AccelerateMutableBuffer] and uses the default implementation of [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/AccelerateMutableBuffer/withUnsafeMutableBufferPointer(_:)], your type needs to return a nonnil result from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/ContiguousArray/withContiguousMutableStorageIfAvailable(_:)-564v7].

## Instance Methods

- **withUnsafeMutableBufferPointer(_:)**: Calls the given closure with a pointer to the object’s mutable contiguous storage.
- **withUnsafePixelBuffer(body:)**
- **withUnsafePixelBuffer(body:)**
- **withUnsafePixelBuffer(body:)**
- **withUnsafePixelBuffer(body:)**

## Essentials

- **AccelerateBuffer**: A type that represents an immutable buffer.
- **AccelerateMatrixBuffer**
- **AccelerateMutableMatrixBuffer**
- **AccelerateMatrixOrder**

## Inherits From

- AccelerateBuffer

## Conforming Types

- vImage.PixelBuffer
